contentrichtext.text: {{Multiple issues|notability = August 2010|prose = August 2010|unreferenced = April 2008}} '''[[Holiday]]s in [[Nauru]]'''. Nauru is an island nation in Micronesia. {| class="wikitable" |+ Holidays |- ! Date !! English Name !! Local Name !! Remarks |- | January 1 | [[New Year's Day]] | | |- | January 31 | [[Independence Day]] | | Anniversary of independence in 1968 |- | March-April | [[Good Friday]] | | |- | May 17 | [[Constitution Day]] | | Anniversary of constitution in 1968 |- | October 26 | [[Angam Day]] | | Celebrates the several occasions when Nauru's population has reached 1500, the minimum supposed sustainable population size |- | December 25, 26 | [[Christmas]] | | |} {{Nauru topics}} {{Oceania topic|Public holidays in}} [[Category:Nauruan culture]] [[Category:Public holidays by country|Nauru]] [[Category:Events in Nauru]]
